about: The team of CG artists, software developers, designers and animators located at cold Siberia. We are experimenting with game engines, VR technologies and biomechanics for game development purposes.

assets.description: AAA quality sniper rifle (XM2010) with 4K PBR textures, 3 LODs, VFX, SFX, FPS animated arms and environment props.
AAA quality pump action shotgun (Mossberg 590A1) with 4K PBR textures, 3 LODs, VFX, SFX, FPS animated arms and environment props.
AAA quality weapon mods for Picatinny / Weaver rail with 4K PBR textures, 3 LODs.
AAA quality american assault rifle (AR15) with 4K PBR textures, 3 LODs, VFX, SFX, FPS animated arms and environment props.
AAA quality german assault rifle (MR762) with 4K PBR textures, 3 LODs, VFX, SFX, FPS animated arms and environment props.
AAA quality russian assault rifle (AK105) with 4K PBR textures, 3 LODs, VFX, SFX, FPS animated arms and environment props.
